---
name: Feature Request / Enhancement
about: Suggest a new feature, technology stack, or improvement
title: '[FEATURE] '
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

## Feature Description

A clear and concise description of the feature or enhancement you'd like to see.

## Problem Statement

What problem does this solve? Why is this needed?

## Proposed Solution

Detailed description of how you envision this working:

### For New Technology Stacks

If requesting a new stack (Python, Go, Swift, etc.), please provide:
- [ ] Language/framework name and version
- [ ] Key patterns to validate (e.g., null safety, error handling)
- [ ] Common pitfalls in this stack
- [ ] Example code snippets (❌ BAD vs ✅ GOOD)
- [ ] Links to official style guides or best practices

### For New Checklists/Rules

If requesting new rules, please provide:
- [ ] Category (security, testing, performance, reliability, readability)
- [ ] Specific rule description
- [ ] Why this matters (impact on quality/security/performance)
- [ ] Code examples demonstrating the issue
- [ ] References (OWASP, official docs, industry standards)

### For Documentation Improvements

If suggesting documentation changes:
- [ ] Which file(s) need improvement
- [ ] What's unclear or missing
- [ ] Suggested improvements or additions

## Alternatives Considered

What other approaches have you thought about?

## Impact and Priority

- **How many teams/users would benefit?**: (estimate)
- **Priority**: Low / Medium / High / Critical
- **Urgency**: Can wait / Would be nice soon / Needed urgently

## Additional Context

- Related issues or PRs
- Examples from other projects
- Screenshots or mockups
- Any other relevant information

## Willingness to Contribute

- [ ] I'm willing to implement this myself (with guidance)
- [ ] I can provide examples and review the PR
- [ ] I'm just suggesting, but can't contribute code
- [ ] I'd like to help but need help getting started
